to answer MasterBluestar ("...But good knows why this piece of shit is 1.9 GB (!) Why?")

This DVD is bootable. It contains the entire Mac OS X. When you boot from it, you get full graphical user interface.

Obviously, when you put the disc in your Mac that is already running, you have a choice to install the application onto your hard disk. This will be significantly smaller than 2GB.

As for languages, there are many people (indeed, many countries) that are bi- and multi-lingual. While every Mac must have a primary language, many of them allow use of multiple languages. I don't want single language support in any of my applications (including drive utilities). 200MB is pocket lint these days. You can't be seriously complaining about that???!!
